name: Dice the Rolls
description:
Chez Frenchie is under attack! A swarm of killer sushi rolls invade your three star Michelin restaurant. You must roll the dice to dice these rolls before they overwhelm you and drive out all your loyal customers. Slice and dice and survive to achieve the highest score you can reach. See if you can beat the dev's highscore of 61890.

Game Designer & Programmer - Zeyad Elbadrawy
Art Designer - Kirbysup
Sound Designer - Jord
